mapper.select: select distinct du from mms_bu_du_pdu where bu = #{bu}
select distinct pdu from mms_bu_du_pdu where bu = #{bu} and du = #{du}
select distinct tmp.sort as sort from ( select distinct sort from mms_training_info union select distinct system as sort from mms_examination_affair) tmp
select distinct tmp.series as series from ( select distinct series from mms_training_info union select distinct series from mms_examination_affair) tmp

select training_id as trainingId, training_name as trainingName, series, sort, type, class_type as classType, bu, creator_id as creatorId, creator_name as creatorName, create_time as createTime, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updateName, training_des as trainingDes, training_duration as trainingDuration from mms_training_info where status=0
AND sort = '${sort}'
AND class_type = '${classType}'
AND bu = '${bu}'
AND training_name like '%${trainingName}%'
AND series like '%${series}%'
AND training_id = #{trainingId}
order by create_time desc;

insert into mms_training_info (training_name, series, sort, type, class_type, bu, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, training_des, training_duration) values (#{trainingName}, #{series}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{classType}, #{bu}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, now(), #{trainingDes}, #{trainingDuration})

update mms_training_info set training_name = #{trainingName}, series = #{series}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, class_type = #{classType}, bu = #{bu}, updater_id = #{updaterId}, updater_name = #{updaterName}, training_des = #{trainingDes}, training_duration = #{trainingDuration}, create_time = now() where training_id = #{trainingId}
update mms_training_info set status = 1 where training_id = #{trainingId}
select employeeName from mms_base_staff_info where employeeId = #{id}
select count(1) from mms_training_info where status = 0 and training_name = #{trainingName}
